task.title: Filing the audit log as a record
task.shortdesc: When you've run an audit log you then have the option to file it as a record.

step.cmd: When you've run an audit, click File as Record in the Audit tool of the Records Management Console.
Choose the destination folder for the audit record.

step.stepresult: A message confirms that the audit log has been filed as a record in the selected folder in the File Plan.You'll need to add the required metadata before the record can be completed.

step.cmd: Click OK to dismiss the message. You can also click View Record to display the audit report in the Records Management site.
